column4: has anyone had any luck (network) tethering an iphone to a Ubuntu 10.04 machine (either bluetooth or usb)?
i have a article from the magazine linux user that you might get something out
here is the link to my dropbox http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1649987/Linux%20user%20issue%2086/Linux%20user%20issue%2086%20how%20to%20tether%20your%20iphone.pdf
if you get anything useful from it please help me ;)
